titleStmt.title: The reduction of a digressor, or, Rich. Baxter's reply to Mr George Kendall's digression in his book against Mr Goodwin
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Thomas Underhill, at the Anchor and Bible in Pauls Church-yard near the little North-door, and Francis Tyton, at the three Daggers in Fleetstreet near Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part of "Rich. Baxters apology" (Wing B1187).
Final leaves contain the postscript and errata.
A variant has a colon after "digressor".
Reproduction of originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard near the little North-door
the three Daggers in Fleetstreet near Dunstans Church
